author: Blucat

changelog.release_notes:
Colored watchface formed by concentric circles that change color with the background automatically every minute. The colors change occur randomly even shaking the clock or by pressing the select button. 
Also shown are the hours, minutes (in the upper corners) and the number of the day and the month in the lower corners.
You will always have a different colored watchface.
